name: GoMacro Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Bar
description:
Packed with 12g of plant-based protein, GoMacro’s Oatmeal Chocolate Chip bar is a delicious way to speed up your recovery.Organic ingredients: brown rice syrup, sunflower seed butter, protein blend (sprouted brown rice protein, pea protein), gluten-free rolled oats, fair-trade chocolate chips (coconut sugar, cocoa, cocoa butter), crispy brown rice (brown rice, brown rice syrup, sea salt), maple syrup, natural flavor, puffed brown rice, sea salt.Manufactured in a facility that processes peanuts and other nuts.May contain pit or nutshell fragments.

        Sustainability
